Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI allowed me to get feedback faster and more efficiently, allowing me to go through several iterations of feedback.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Feedback from a teacher is more trustworthy and makes me feel more secure, whereas GenAI is more convenient.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI offers a faster, on-demand tool for obtaining feedback on a given task, more helpful than teachers who struggle to provide detailed feedback in a large class. Though, in a smaller class, teachers provide more trustworthy and in-depth feedback.
